metadata.description: Professional engineering workflow plugins with automated session management, code quality tools, and specialized review agents

plugins.name: exito
plugins.description: Complete senior engineer workflow system with research, planning, implementation, testing, and review phases. Includes automated session management with hooks.

plugins.name: setup
plugins.description: Development environment setup commands for installing and configuring essential tools (GitHub CLI, Azure CLI, uv) across macOS, Linux, and Windows platforms.

plugins.name: plugin-builder
plugins.description: Comprehensive Claude Code plugin development toolkit with templates, guides, and interactive commands for building custom plugins, commands, agents, workflows, hooks, and MCP integrations
